name: DIEmunition
description:
Welcome to DIEmunition! The shooter-platformer where you use dice as your platforms… and your ammunition!

Survive by jumping on the falling dice platforms and shooting enemies. But be careful – your gun has no ammo! The only way to shoot is to stand on a die to use the dots on its face as ammunition. But watch out! Once a dice’s bullets are used up, it disappears, leaving you vulnerable to the acid below!

 Shoot while standing on BULLET DICE to fire bullets  "Shoot" while standing on HEART DICE to regain health  Shoot while standing on POWER-UP DICE to fire heavy artillery

_________________________________________________

TIPS & TRICKS:

- Shoot dice that are in mid-air to lock them into their value and have them instantly drop!

- You've got a double jump. Use it!

_________________________________________________

CONTROLS:

WASD / Arrow keys – Move
W / Up / Space – Jump + Double Jump
Mouse – Aim
Left Click – Shoot
M – Mute
R – Restart
